name: Xenosaga Episode III: Also sprach Zarathustra
name_original: Xenosaga Episode III: Also sprach Zarathustra
description:
Xenosaga Episode III: Also sprach Zarathustra is a RPG game. It came out on 29-08-2006. On review aggregator Metacritic, Xenosaga Episode III: Also sprach Zarathustra has a score of 81. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Xenosaga Episode III: Also sprach Zarathustra is available on PlayStation 2.
Tomohiro Hagiwara produced the game. Koh Arai directed the game. Yuki Kajiura scored the game.
